content: **a newborn cardigan a pattern with three sizes is available to purchase separately 1 ** the cabled braid adds interest to the centre front it closes with snaps and pretty buttons can be sewn on top the inner snap band is wide so you can move the snaps a bit further when your baby grows **sizes** the free version of this pattern is for the newborn size only 0-3 months a pattern with two additional sizes 4-7 months and 8-12 months is also available in my ravelry store note that wear can be extended due to the extra wide snap band check the measurements in the diagram **skills** intermediate skills casting on knitting purling simple cabling from chart or written instructions increasing decreasing knitting in the round for the sleeves binding off knitting two sleeves at the same time optional **what you ll need** 4mm us 6 circular needle the body can be knit with straight needles 200 metres / 220 yards of dk yarn a cabling needle a tapestry needle three to six medium clear snaps the same or a smaller amount of buttons optional 12 stitch markers or loops of yarn preferably 2 pink 4 green 4 blue and 2 orange two bits of cotton yarn or stitch holders for the sleeves the hat pictured is my free pattern tres picos 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tristan-8 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tres-picos-2
